Installation¶

Prerequisites¶

  • python >= 2.7 and developement headers
  • cython
  • Linux kernel >= 3.5 and development headers
  • libcap and development headers
  • gcc

Install from sources¶

  • Download the archive from github
  • make a virtualenv
  • run python setup.py

Install with pip¶

(later)
